root: ^The small shadow you met earlier appears in your path, looking slightly less afraid.
^'Thank you... for staying. I have something for you. I kept it safe.'

c-0: ^It holds out a worn amulet, humming with a protective energy. 'To guard your heart.' (Got [Amulet of Steadfast])
c-1: ^It nods, understanding. It points instead to a pile of forgotten coins you hadn't noticed in a nearby alcove. (+150 Gold)
